intro.first_introduction: Propel your career with AI. Analyze the job market and optimize your profile in seconds.
intro.second_introduction: Discover the most in-demand skills in your area.
intro.third_introduction: Optimize your applications for ATS and recruiters.
intro.fourth_introduction: Prepare for interviews with AI-generated practice questions and feedback.

login.invalid_password: Password must be at least 6 characters
login.forgot_password_message: Enter your email to receive a code to reset your password.
login.reset_password_message: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.

register.invalid_password: Password must be at least 6 characters
register.confirm_email: Check your email to continue your registration.

home.disclaimer: Results based on analysis of dozens of recent job postings in your area.

profil.upgrade_plan_title: The premium plan is coming soon!
profil.upgrade_plan_message: We're finalizing our AI-powered career tools to boost your profile. Stay tuned.
profil.file_type: Supported file types: JPG, JPEG, PNG
profil.change_email_message: Enter the details below to receive your confirmation code.
profil.oauth_email_message: You are logged in via LinkedIn. Your email address is managed by LinkedIn and cannot be changed here.
profil.oauth_password_message: You are logged in via LinkedIn. LinkedIn accounts do not have a Joblyx password. To change your credentials, please access your LinkedIn account settings.
profil.delete_account_message: This action is irreversible. All your personal data, history, and preferences will be permanently deleted.
profil.delete_account_email_mismatch: Email does not match your account

settings.title: Settings
settings.logout_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
settings.contact_message: Have a question, found a bug, or have an idea to improve Joblyx? Your suggestions help us build the best tool for your carreer. Get in touch!

err.weak_password: The password provided is too weak.
err.user_already_exists: An account already exists for that email.
err.no_session_found: No active session found. Please log in again.
err.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
err.same_password: The new password is the same as the current password.
err.over_email_send_rate_limit: Too many requests. Please try again later.
err.user_not_found: No user found for that email.
err.unknown_error: Unknown error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
err.email_exists: This email address already exists in our system.
err.same_email: The new email is the same as the current email.
err.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Only JPG, JPEG, and PNG are allowed.
err.file_size_exceeded: File size exceeds the 15 MB limit.
err.compression_failed: Failed to compress the image. Please try again.
err.upload_failed: Failed to upload the image. Please try again.
err.resend_failed: Failed to resend the code. Please try again or contact support.
err.logout_failed: Failed to logout. Please try again.
err.update_failed: Failed to update. Please try again.
err.bad_oauth_state: Data received from OAuth provider is invalid
err.conflict: Too many session refresh requests firing off at the same time for  user.
err.flow_state_expired: The flow state has expired. Login again.
err.flow_state_not_found: The flow state was not found. Login again.
err.identity_already_exists: An account already exists with the same identity provider.
err.network_error: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.
err.api_error: Server error. Please try again later.

code_verification.title: Code verification
code_verification.message: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
code_verification.success_message: Your email has been successfully verified.
code_verification.send_message: A verification code has been sent to your email.

advice.title: Advice
advice.description: Paste the job description below to get tailored advice on improving your resume and preparing for interviews.
advice.disclaimer: Advices are generated by AI so they may not be 100% accurate. Always review and adapt the suggestions to fit your unique profile and the specific job requirements.
